interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Vitamin C Serum for Face - C Booster With Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E - Anti Wrinkle - Anti Aging - Skin Repair For Age Spots and Sun Damage - For Men and Women Review Date: 2016/04/30 Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Volume': '30 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.04 x 1.97 x 1.73 inches; 4.23 Ounces'} Review Text: 180 Cosmetics C Booster Vit C Serum w/ hyaluronic acid & Vit E
This products says it helps with hydration, elasticity & suppleness. It's true! That is exactly what it does!
I use this serum morning & night on clean skin. You just need a thin layer. I use it on my neck also. Then, just as the directions state- add your moisturizer. Very easy! I put what's left on the backs of my hands. I am trying to get into the practice of using the same products on my face & then on my elbows & backs of hands. It really makes a difference!
I like the look of the bottle & the thin jelly-like serum. I've had other Vitamin C serums & I like 180' the best. It makes my skin look hydrated & feeds my wrinkles some nutrients. Hard to describe! Not a 20 year difference but I am 66. I still look like me-just healthier.
I did receive my serum at a reduced price for an honest opinion. It's great! Thank You!! Review Title: Very easy! I put what's left on the backs of ... Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Miracalis - Best Face Cream Moisturizer With Advanced Anti Aging Wrinkle Formula. Clinically Proven To Reduce Wrinkle Depth, Smooth Fine Lines & Soften Skin. Cruelty Free, Hypoallergenic Miracalis ['* Face Moisturizer * Face Anti Aging * Deep Hydration Face Cream * Hydrating Anti Aging Moisturizer * Aging Cream * Hydration Cream For Face * Regenerating Day Cream * Face Moisturizing Cream * Facial Moisturizers Anti Aging * Anti Aging Facial Cream * Hydrating Moisturizer for Face * Deep Moisturizing Face Cream * Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Moisturizing Cream Anti Aging * Peptide Face Cream * Moisturizer Facial Cream * Deep Face Moisturizer * Hydrating Facial Moisturizer * Best Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Anti Aging Skin Care * Bare Mineral * Neck Moisturizer * Neck Cream * Skin Cream * Anti Aging Skin', 'Your Face Will Look Lovelier In Only 15 Days!', 'Reduces the depth of your facial wrinkles with daily use.', 'You will quickly look noticeably younger, healthier, and more attractive.', 'Simply apply Miracalis Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream right after washing your face in the morning and again at night.', 'What About My Skin Type?', 'A safe, gentle, hypoallergenic formula that is tested and recommended for all 4 major skin types: Normal, Sensitive, Dry or Oily Skin', 'Your Shield Against The Signs Of Aging', "Your skin is under daily attack - air pollution, the sun's harmful rays, germs and time itself all wear down your skin's natural barriers. The result is dry, cracked and tired looking skin.", 'Our formula restores the two natural antioxidants (Vitamin E and Co-Enzyme Q10) that your skin needs to properly repair and maintain this barrier.', 'Your skin will look younger, be less sensitive. You will have healthier, attractive and glowing skin again.', '100% Satisfaction Guaranteed, Made in the USA'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.63 x 2.63 x 2.05 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MIR-AAM001', 'UPC': '820103882309 794168056596', 'Manufacturer': 'Miracalis'} "Great feeling cream! Cool going on. Liked the e-book on Anti-Aging tips. I'm working on my "marionette" aging lines starting to go down from my mouth. They actually look less noticeable. This may just be the cream to soften & MAYBE get rid of them! Keeping my fingers crossed-Thank you!" Cool going on Pink Hair Brush THZY ['FLAT IRON'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 2.9 x 1.7 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'VZ-DETBR-PK', 'UPC': '609595109299', 'Manufacturer': 'THZY'} Love this brush! It really fits in your hand & feels so good on your scalp! It does the job for detangling without ripping my hair out or breaking the ends off! I laid the brush down & the next thing I knew, my cat was rubbing his chin on it! A sure sign that it's a good brush! I'm getting my granddaughter one because she uses a brush on her wet long hair. She really needs to quit pulling & breaking her hair. Thanks for a great product! Love this brush Professional Grade Retinol Anti-Aging Skin Moisturizing Cream - For Age Spots - By Swiss Botany {'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.69 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '791154469675'} Great moisturizer! This cream does indeed absorb into the skin. It feels refreshing & it doesn't have a scent to me. I've been using a lot of various serums & having an actual cream to use is a nice change! The pump dispenses nicely & there's no waste. Quite a lot of uses in the bottle. I'll be using this for a quite a while-Thanks for a great product! Great moisturizer! profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest**: Anti-aging skincare products focused on facial hydration, wrinkle reduction, and hair care tools.
- **Key Attributes**: Prefers hypoallergenic, cruelty-free, and clinically proven products. Enjoys sensorial experiences in skincare and hair care.
- **Usage Pattern**: Applies serums and face creams both morning and night for maximum effectiveness, valuing ergonomic designs in hair tools for comfortable use.
- **Desired Outcomes**: Seeks visible improvements in skin appearance, such as enhanced hydration, elasticity, and reduced wrinkle depth. Emphasizes formulations that support the skin's natural defenses against aging and promotes gentle detangling for hair.
- **User Experience**: Appreciates products that deliver noticeable results with effective absorption and a refreshing feel. Engages positively with lightweight formulations that avoid greasy residues and offer soothing properties.
- **Feedback & Engagement**: Recently shared enthusiasm for serums that boost hydration and elasticity, reinforcing a commitment to high-quality, effective products. Values the ease of application and versatility in using products on both skin and hands, while also practicing comprehensive skincare routines.

The user remains committed to enhancing their anti-aging skincare and hair care routine, focusing on hydration, efficacy, and ethical standards. Their latest experience highlights a preference for lightweight solutions that contribute to a healthier appearance while adhering to their established skincare goals.
